chara.textHome:
I get a little self conscious when it's just
the two of us fighting.

It reminds me of the old days,
it's been so long since then.
*Giggle*

Yes. How about an investigation,
just like we used to?
That sounds like fun.

I'll show you how much
I've learned since then!

Iroha seems to be preoccupied during
battle.I have to let her know there's
no reason to be scared.
You're really such a huge help, Iroha.
Thank you so much.
R-really?!

I'm the one who should be
thanking you, Yachiyo!

Not bad. Let's keep this going and
get rid of all those impurities!
We're all ready.
Let's finish this before dinner, Iroha!
Oh, that was a close one.
They caught me off guard there.

Don't worry, I'm here to protect
you until the very end.

The power that once saved us,
flows within us again.

If we work together,
I'm sure we can even fly.
We can, Yachiyo.
Let's go, it's now or never!

Oh, I was about to go out
with Yachiyo just now.

Hurry, Iroha!
Today is ten-times-the-points day,
the supermarket is going to be a battlefield!
*Sigh*
I'm sorry, Iroha, I'm really quite tired...
Then I'll prepare breakfast today.

I'll make something that'll give
you some energy!

Eating out for lunch like this
seems kinda unfair...
You're right...

Let's buy something for Felicia
and Sana, too.

We were just about to go hunt
some Witches.
Want to come with us?
Trust me, you won't regret it.
Finally, we're home...
We bought quite a lot, way more than usual.
I'll draw us a bath.
Let's relax a little before we prepare dinner.
Zzz... zZz... Zzz...
Yachiyo must be really tired.

I'll carry her to her room before
she catches a cold...
Gotta be gentle so she doesn't wake up...

If the dot here is where we are now,
we turn left here, right?

Really, why does it look like the opposite
direction to you? You're really not good
at using your smartphone.
Um, er... Sorry...
Yachiyo, I sense a Witch nearby!
We'll have to take care of it...

Oh, and Iroha, don't forget our groceries
in the Labyrinth!

Do you think food could also be
copied in Endless Mirrors?
Even if that were possible, would you eat it?
Um, uh... Probably not...

That store's tea has recently
become very popular.
Oh, really?
We can buy some and try it together.

You surprised me when you started
running towards that shrine.
Did you make a wish?

Yes, I wished for this happiness
to last forever.

It's really quiet at home with
just the two of us here.

Probably because the TV
and radio aren't on.
Would you like to listen to some music?
No, it's okay.
I like it like this.

So Ui has no trouble using her smartphone
and computer?

Well, Touka is an expert so I guess
she learned about them from her...
This tea I got from Banbanzai smells great.
I love how it smells too...

Maybe they'd be more successful
selling tea?
Emergency Meeting!
Okay!
Look at this, Felicia hid her exam...
It's all wrinkled...

A zero?! 
But she was studying with Tsuruno!
Oh, she forgot to write her name...

We got this package today.
Do you know who it's for?
Oh, that's Sana's.

She's been doing most of her shopping
online recently.
Um...
What is it?

Yachiyo, have you ever thought of
going out with someone?
What? No.

I'm too busy to even think about
something like that.

When I was fighting alone,
I was always so stressed out.
But that's changed, right?
Remember, we're all here for you.
Yes, I know. I'm thankful for that.

As we are now, no curse
or impurity can stop us!
Yeah, Yachiyo! Let's finish this!
You really thought we'd fall for that?
Our bond led us to victory, right?
Yachiyo, are you all right?
I'm okay, Iroha. Thank you.
I won't let this power go to waste.
Just you wait and see!

This is our moment...
Time to combine our magic!
Talking about this, it gets me so nervous...
and embarrassed...

I wonder if our teamwork could be
further improved...

I feel like it's always Yachiyo helping me,
and not the other way around..
